summary: This is a brief email chain from November 13, 2021, discussing a Daily Mail article containing an interview with Ghislaine Maxwell from prison. The emails show internal communication about the article and a request to share the full interview when published.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of a Daily Mail interview conducted while she was incarcerated; the email chain is about this interview.

events.title: Daily Mail publishes interview with Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: The Daily Mail publishes an article containing an interview with Ghislaine Maxwell from behind bars, marking her first public comments from prison.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell gave an interview from prison, published by the Daily Mail on or around November 13, 2021.
The email chain indicates internal awareness and monitoring of media coverage related to Maxwell.
The correspondence suggests a fuller interview was expected to be published the following day (Sunday) or Monday.
